name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (Alexey Roenko)
description:
Challenging 2D platformer with simple graphics and great chiptune soundtrack. Try to escape the mysterious dungeon which full of dangerous traps and enemies. 

Features:

  • Minimalistic graphics 
  • Hardcore gameplay 
  • Great original Soundtrack
  • Many levels
  • Enemies blast if jump on their heads
  • Coins! Who does not like a coins?

Can you pass all the tests and get out of a dangerous dungeon?
